item.description:
Hi Members!!!

The North Haven Fair is coming up; it is usually a pretty good time. The special guest on this day -- Sunday, September 9th -- is the Gin Blossoms - "A signature blend of melody, mystery and poignancy that Gin Blossoms fans have come to love -- from the band's breakthrough album, New Miserable Experience through to its powerful follow-up enduring and memorable songs as Hey Jealousy, Allison Road, Follow You Down and Til I Hear It From You. Rock it!" - are having a concert that starts at 5:30 p.m.

You can find out more information including ticket prices, directions, etc. at:

North Haven Fair

Also if members would like to meet before/after the event for some coffee, please let me know. (After all, it is "Coffee Talk" lol.)

I hope to see you there!

-Dawn.
item.name: North Haven Fair!
